rows.label: tlk001901_02_msg0001
rows.name: Going to the usual spot, I take it?

rows.label: tlk001901_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You know, the one on the other side of
the village, with the stunning view.

rows.label: tlk001901_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You go and do your thing, then.
I'll have a nice, hearty meal waiting
for you when you get back!
